title: U.S. House Passes Bills Supporting Hong Kong Protesters
text:
WASHINGTON—The House of Representatives unanimously passed a series of bills supporting protesters in Hong Kong who have called for democratic reforms in the city, delivering a rebuke to Beijing for what the U.S. lawmakers called a corrosion of individual freedoms in the territory.
